scenario_text.value: You really are useless, you know that, Aoi?

Scared to fight, unable to move. Keeping your
mouth shut when someone disagrees with you.
You haven’t been any help to anyone.

That’s not—I just don’t want anybody to get
hurt...

At the very least, couldn’t you serve up that
useless life of yours for everyone’s sake?

Hold yourself together, Aoi! Labramon would
never say those things to you!

Labramon adores you, you know that. To her,
your existence is irreplaceable.

She’d never let you give up your life for
someone else!
Yeah, you’re a big fat phony!

(She vanished. I knew it wasn’t the real
Labramon.)
